description:
### integerToStringOfFixedWidth

This function converts a number to a string of a specified width, prepending it with zeros if it is shorter or trimming the right side if it is longer.

Input: Two parameters - a number and the width of the string (integer).
Output: Returns the string representation of the number, trimmed or padded to match the specified width.

Example:

``` integerToStringOfFixedWidth(1234, 2) // "34" ```
